div.p: The Apache ActiveMQ team is proud to announce the release of Apache ActiveMQ 5.11.1.
This release addresses issues in the 5.11.0 release, including AMQ-5564 which addresses a potential memory leak..
Thank you to Timothy Bish and Claus Ibsen for promptly addressing AMQ-5564. And thank you to Hadrian Zbarcea for merging commits in preparation for the release.
Please see the release page for download links and more information!
